title: If you say "its gg" or some variant because you gave up a few kills, please see a Urologists

embed.description: There are various non-cancerous conditions that can affect the testicles, and they are also prone to injury because they are not protected by muscle or bone. It is important to seek prompt medical attention for any testicular complaint. Testicles are also known as testes (one is a testis) or 'balls'.

body: Testicle injury or missing testicles is a serious condition. Once you receive proper treatment please return to league of legends and realize sometimes you don't have a perfect early game but can still pretty easily win a decent percentage of games. Thank you.

replies.body: Upvoted because I hate the attitude you're attacking.

But what about the ladies of league? 

Also....

"Why do people say "grow some balls"? Balls are weak and sensitive. If you wanna be tough, grow a vagina. Those things can take a pounding." - Betty White. Enjoy.
If people who give up quickly have no balls, people who never give up ("all we gotta do is pray they keep dancing instead of hitting our Nexus") have no brains.

Had a toplaner Olaf yesterday against a Tryndamere. I was jungle. I secured 1st 2 fire drake and rift herald, and I successfully gank botlane and midlane to put mid and bot ahead. 
Meanwhile Olaf goes 0/10/0 and proceeds to flame me and go "gg jungle useless". 

Later on also proceeds to say "wanna see what true intentional feeding is?" And starts running down mid.
Nothing better than a toplane going afk when you have every other tower but his lane, spamming "its gg I cant carry" cause he got camped.
